origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'AutoModAPI.estimate_value_increase', 'description': 'This function estimates the potential increase in market value of a car after specific modifications based on the type of modification, current market value, and modification cost.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'modificationType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of modification, e.g., engine_upgrade, body_kit.'}, {'name': 'currentMarketValue', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The current market value of the car.'}, {'name': 'modificationCost', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The cost of the modification.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'estimatedIncrease', 'description': 'The estimated increase in market value after the modification.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 AutoModAPI.estimate_value_increase, 它的参数输入如下: 'modificationType'是'engine_upgrade', 'currentMarketValue'是'20000', 'modificationCost'是'5000'.
